title.rendered: The Future of Agencies with Seth Godin – Deep-Dive Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”custom-header”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597242060346{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Future of Agencies with Seth Godin

[vc_text_separator title=”Deep-dive Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1597244890286{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843355664{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Author of the bestselling book This is Marketing, and world-renowned speaker & teacher, Seth Godin joins SharpSpring CMO Chip House for a live Q&A to discuss his thoughts on the future of agencies. Walk away with insights on everything from effective marketing and leadership to the spread of ideas and changing everything.

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with top influencers in digital marketing like Neil Patel, Rand Fishkin, Ann Handley, Shama Hyder and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Seth Godin

Author, Entrepreneur, Teacher

Seth Godin is an entrepreneur, best-selling author, speaker, and most importantly – a teacher. In addition to having one of the most popular blogs in the world, he has written 19 best-selling books and founded two companies, Squidoo and Yoyodyne (acquired by Yahoo!). He focuses on everything from effective marketing and leadership to the spread of ideas and changing everything.

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1607710056016{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
